Depression and Anxiety Stress Scale Scoring Questionnaire

concept.display: Mild Depression, please consult your nearest healthcare facility for further information.
concept.definition: Mild Depression, please consult your nearest healthcare facility for further information.

concept.display: Moderate Depression, please consult your nearest healthcare facility for further information.
concept.definition: Moderate Depression, please consult your nearest healthcare facility for further information.

concept.display: Severe Depression, please consult your nearest healthcare facility for further information.
concept.definition: Severe Depression, please consult your nearest healthcare facility for further information.

concept.display: Extremely Severe Depression, please seek medical attention from your nearest healthcare facility.
concept.definition: Extremely Severe Depression, please seek medical attention from your nearest healthcare facility.
